info.name: Numark NS4FX (DEV)
info.author: Erik Puschendorf, Matthew Nicholson, Oliver, Rowen Stipe
info.description: Numark NS4FX mapping with support for LCD screens and 4 deck playback.

option.label: Shift + Load Ejects
option.description: Should holding shift while pressing load eject load the track to the deck instead of ejecting it.

option.label: Show Focused Effect Parameters
option.description: Display the currently focused effect parameters.

option.label: Only Active Deck Effect Control
option.description: Use effect on both decks [1,3] [2,4] or only active deck.

option.label: Display UV from both decks
option.description: Display UV meters for both decks [1,3] [2,4] or only active.

option.label: Debug message verbosity
option.description: How cluttered do you want your log file to be?

control.description: Browse Knob used for track selection.
Fires when a deck is disabled.
